sen.j: 中村 霞仙（なかむら かせん）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Kasen NAKAMURA is a name which was used by some Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: ここでは特定の一人の役者のことを説明しているのではなく、複数の役者に使用されてきた「名前」について言及しているため、そのことが明確になるように訳出いたしました。
sen.e: Kasen NAKAMURA is a name which was used by some Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
Kasen NAKAMURA is a name which was used by some Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
He was an adopted son of Sojuro NAKAMURA.
He was an adopted son of Sojuro NAKAMURA.
He was an adopted son of Sojuro NAKAMURA.
He was a son of the first generation.
